jobDescription: London-based Fintech start-up. The product is Banking-as-a-service (BaaS) solution, already running live in a production environment. The solution is based on a transactional engine designed as a distribution, uses a blockchain to ensure data consistency, and handles 60,000 transactions per second. Project technology stack: Java/Spring, Kafka, Postgres/Cassandra, etcd, Jaeger, Kubernetes.
requirements: Strong knowledge and experience in Spring framework and Kafka;
Knowledge of REST API best practices;
Intermediate English or above (both written and verbal).
